title: Chandrika Kundan Necklace Set - A Timeless Elegance
materials: Natural Blue Sapphires. Features the signature Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster. The Kundan stones are carefully set

The design incorporates strategically placed natural blue sapphires, adding a touch of color and regality. The setting showcases superior craftsmanship, common in traditional Hyderabadi jewelry.
colors: Predominantly gold with a shimmering white (Polki) and pops of deep blue (Sapphire). The overall effect is a rich and luxurious color palette
indicative of South Indian bridal jewelry.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for formal events where a touch of traditional elegance is desired.
description: This Chandrika Kundan Necklace Set is a true heirloom piece, embodying timeless elegance and superior craftsmanship. The combination of Polki diamonds and sapphires makes it unique, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures its lasting shine. Owning this piece is not just owning jewelry; it's owning a piece of South Indian cultural heritage. The use of natural gemstones adds to its value and ensures its enduring appeal.
